title: Week 4 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Clown Show - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/28
description:
Week 4 Waiver Wire! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 4 waiver pickups and QB streamers! Andy, Mike, and Jason talk through some tough player drop decisions to be made! Plus, injury updates and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 28th, 2021.
 (02:00) - MNF Recap: Eagles at Cowboys
 (09:15) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire (Odell Beckham, Brandon Aiyuk, Brandin Cooks)
 (17:20) - NFL News
 (28:10) - Week 4 Waivers
 (28:20) - WR Waivers
 (40:00) - RB Waivers
 (49:35) - TE Waivers 
 (53:55) - DST Waivers 
 (54:40) - QB Streamers
